evidence.claim: Vesta Healthcare utilizes AWS for its infrastructure to ensure scalability and compliance with healthcare standards.
The company mentions compliance with HIPAA and utilization of FHIR for data exchange in care management.
Vesta Healthcare's platform integrates healthcare data using HL7 standards to support interoperability.
They engage with X12 transaction sets for billing and insurance processing as part of their health-tech solutions.

icp.icp_reason: Vesta Healthcare uses X12 formats and EDI for healthcare interoperability.
matched_use_cases: EDI Transactions for claims and remittance
